parameter.name: content_inset_bottom
parameter.help: The bottom inset for the dialog contents from the edge of the window inner frame.

parameter.name: content_inset_left
parameter.help: The left inset for the dialog contents from the edge of the window inner frame.

parameter.name: content_inset_right
parameter.help: The right inset for the dialog contents from the edge of the window inner frame

parameter.name: content_inset_top
parameter.help: The top inset for the dialog contents from the edge of the window inner frame.
